name: BungeeBuds
description:
Two player co-op game where players must traverse the level with a bungee cord connected between them. Players must coordinate together to reach the end of the stage by taking advantage of the elastic bungee cord.

We recommend downloading the file for better optimization (link at bottom).

Controls:

Player 1:

W - jump (hold to jump higher)

S - Stick to walls/floors

A - Move left

D - Move Right

Player 2:

I - jump (hold to jump higher)

K - Stick to walls/floors

J - Move left

L - Move Right

Press escape to quit the game.

Press R or Space to reset from last checkpoint

We hope you enjoy our game!
